contents: At the bottom of the Mariana Trench, water pressure causes the ocean to be 5% denser than at the surface. The temperature is nearly freezing, between one and four degrees Celsius. _____(8)_____ the harsh environment of the Challenger Deep, life thrives. Shrimp-like crustaceans, sea cucumbers, and jellyfish are all found in the deepest part of the ocean. Large single-celled organisms, including _____(9)_____ been observed there.
